text: The BMC Racing Cup is a multi-round mountain bike racing series with different venues in Switzerland. The discipline in which national and international riders compete is the Olympic Cross-country (XCO). In 2014 Lenzerheide hosted one of the races of the BMC Racing Cup, and the same track was used again for the third round of the 2015 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup. ==Calendar== Dates and venues from 2009 to 2015 are: ===2009 Season=== *Round #1 18px Lugano - Tesserete (April 18). *Round #2 18px Solothurn (May 9). *Round #3 18px Gränichen (June 7). *Round #4 18px Winterthur (June 21). *Round #5 18px Engelberg - Titlis (June 28). *Round #6 18px Plaffeien (July 19). *Round #7 18px Bern (August 9). *Round #8 18px Muttenz (August 23). ===2010 Season=== *Round #1 18px Buchs (March 28). *Round #2 18px Lugano - Tesserete (April 11). *Round #3 18px Solothurn (May 8). *Round #4 18px Plaffeien (May 30). *Round #5 18px Champéry (June 6). *Round #6 18px Engelberg - Titlis (June 20). *Round #7 18px Flims (July 3). *Round #8 18px Muttenz (August 22). ===2011 Season=== *Round #1 18px Schaan (March 27). *Round #2 18px Lugano - Tesserete (April 10). *Round #3 18px Solothurn (May 7). *Round #4 18px Gränichen (June 5). *Round #5 18px Engelberg - Titlis (June 12). *Round #6 18px Chur (June 26). *Round #7 18px Muttenz (August 28). ===2012 Season=== *Round #1 18px Buchs (April 1). *Round #2 18px Lugano -
